values: 购买；获得；赢得；抓紧；紧握；（通过杠杆作用）举起
购买；购得物品；获得；控制力；抓牢；抓紧；蹬稳；杠杆作用；滑轮；影响力

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通日常用词，既可指日常随意购物也可指大的购买。
正式用词，指大宗购货或购买重要东西。无感情色彩，强调物品的购得。

bilingual.source: Select the items you want to purchase.
Please check the sizes before making a purchase.
They plan to purchase a house next year.
bilingual.target: 他们计划明年购买一套房子。

bilingual.source: The buyer decided to purchase this house.
bilingual.target: 这位买方决定购买这套房子。

bilingual.source: You need a receipt to prove your purchase.
bilingual.target: 你需要收据来证明你的购买。

bilingual.source: She compares the prices before making a purchase.
The manager gave authorisation for the purchase.
bilingual.target: 经理给出了购买的授权。

bilingual.source: You can purchase these spot goods immediately.
bilingual.target: 你可以立即购买这些现货。

bilingual.source: Do you have proof of purchase for this item?
bilingual.target: 你有购买这件商品的凭证吗？

list.abstract: purchase（英 [ˈpɜːtʃəs]，美 [ˈpɜːrtʃəs]），英语单词，作动词为购买；升起；得到。作名词为买；牢固的接触；滑轮。例句：Most people purchase them for collection.（大多数人购买它们是为了收藏。）短语搭配有online purchase（在线购买）。 近义词有buy，反义词有sell。

yingyinNormal.en: For example, I noticed that you purchase your tampons one-month supply at a time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如说我发现你的卫生巾一次是购买一个月的量。

yingyinNormal.en: Knock-knock. Hey. Hi. I took a look at the data purchase patterns. Should I come back?
yingyinNormal.zh: 咚，咚。嘿。嗨。我看过了购买模式的数据。要我过会再来吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. That was a practical purchase. I needed that car for transportation. Okay? I have a child.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是很实际的一项购买，我需要那车子做交通工具好吗？我有小孩。

yingyinNormal.en: Remind me to never illegally purchase a firearm. While you're waiting, here's something rather odd.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提醒我千万不要非法购买武器，你在那儿等待时，这儿可是越发出奇了。

yingyinNormal.en: When young Harry stepped into Flourish and Blotts this morning to purchase my autobiography, Magical Me, which incidentally, is currently celebrating its 27th week atop the Daily Prophet bestseller list, he had no idea that he would, in fact, believing with my entire collected works free of charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈利·波特今天早上特地踏进了华丽与污痕书店来购买我的自传《神奇的我》，顺便提一下这本书最近刚好登上预言家日报畅销书排行榜的第27周榜首，哈利绝对不会想到，他也不会相信，他将会得到我的全套著作，完全免费。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, I'm looking at a purchase order right here.
And the credit-card company. Phil made a large purchase on a Tibetan website called CopingCandles.Com.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有信用卡公司说，菲尔在一家名为“应对困难蜡烛网”的西藏网站上进行了大采购。

yingyinNormal.en: She told him that she wanted to purchase something from him, except she wrote "Perches," like the fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她说她想从他那里买点东西，不过她把「买」写成了「鲈鱼」。

yingyinNormal.en: It's customary, when using the restroom at a retail establishment, to make a small purchase. Did you? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是国际惯例，你用了零售店的厕所，就要随便买点东西，你买了吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: It's an autocorrect glitch. No. "Purchase" isn't spelling anything like the fish. But they do sound alike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 应该是自动更正时出了差错。不，「买」的拼写并不像「鲈鱼」，可发音却很像。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on a second, mister. What? After you used the facilities at the gas station, did you make a purchase? What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，先生。干嘛？你用过加油站的厕所后买东西了吗？什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Not surprising. You have no safety mat or adhesive stickers to allow for purchase on a surface with a low coefficient of static friction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不奇怪。你没有装防滑垫或者防滑贴纸来抵消浴缸表面的很低的静摩擦系数。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采购; 购买(的东西); 获得; 得到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 购买；升起；举起；获得；得到

sense_info_list.zh: 采购; 购买(的东西); 获得; 得到

examination_example.sentence: And placing too much emphasis on their opinions can ruin a fantastic home <highlight>purchase</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过分强调他们的意见会毁掉一次美妙的购房之旅。

examination_example.sentence: The decisions made it more difficult for states to collect sales tax on certain online <highlight>purchases</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些决定使得各州更难对某些网上购物征收销售税。

examination_example.sentence: Buying gifts or giving to charity is often more pleasurable than <highlight>purchasing</highlight> things for oneself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 买礼物或捐给慈善机构通常比给自己买东西更令人愉快。

sample.mean: n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

exam_freq_info.chinese: 购买; 买卖; 货物; 买进物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 购买；升起；举起；获得；得到

sense_info_list.zh: 购买; 买卖; 货物; 买进物

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>purchase</highlight> this 3 million piece of land here, because I'm guaranteeing you today you'll have 1, 000 bison on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您可以在这里购买这块价值三百万的土地，因为我向您保证今天您将拥有1，000头北美野牛在上面。

examination_example.sentence: EPIC fronted the money for the <highlight>purchase</highlight> of $2.5million worth of young bison.
examination_example.sentence_trans: EPIC 花钱购买了价值250万美元的幼年野牛。

examination_example.sentence: Once <highlight>purchased</highlight> and trained, this would allow the casual user to save money and time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦购买和培训(该机器人)，这将使休闲用户节省金钱和时间。

sample.mean: n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

exam_freq_info.chinese: 购买; 买卖; 货物; 买进物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 购买; 买卖; 货物; 买进物

examination_example.sentence: Many of the access codes he's <highlight>purchased</highlight> have been required simply to complete homework or quizzes. Often it's only 10% of your grade in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他购买的许多访问代码仅仅是为了完成作业或测验而被要求使用。这往往只占你上课成绩的10%。

examination_example.sentence: She rented her economics and statistics textbooks for about $ 20 each. But her access codes for homework, which can't be rented or bought second-hand, were her most expensive <highlight>purchases</highlight>: $ 120 and $ 85.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她租了经济学和统计学的课本，每本约20美元。但她的作业的访问码，不能租也不能买二手，是她买的最贵的东西：120美元和85美元。

examination_example.sentence: What happened when Sam Azar swiped his credit card to pay for his <highlight>purchase</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 山姆·阿扎尔刷信用卡付款时发生了什么？

sample.mean: n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Better than half a billion dollars has gone into that Fund to <highlight>purchase</highlight> more than 5 million acres of habitat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过5亿美元已投入该基金，用于购买500多万英亩的栖息地。
大多数人购买它们是为了收藏。

examination_example.sentence: This usually meant the reader had to go down to the printer's office to <highlight>purchase</highlight> a copy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这通常意味着读者必须到印刷厂去买一份。

sample.mean: n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求
